short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy ticket links with the ticket's name in one click or keypress.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you paste the link into slack you'll see the name of the ticket as a link.

Pro tip: Use the keyboard shortcut 's' (as in 'share') to copy links even faster
